BoolProperty.Name: AndroidAttach
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether the debugger should attempt to attach to an existing process when debugging starts.

EnumProperty.Name: AndroidDebugMode
EnumProperty.Description: Sets the type of code that will be debugged for this project.

BoolProperty.Name: AndroidLaunchSuspended
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies if the application should be started in suspended mode so that entry-level functions can be debugged on native side. To enable this the underlying GDB must support load library notifications.

StringProperty.Name: OverrideAPKPath
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the location of the APK that will be debugged instead of using the value from build.xml

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalGdbDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Source code directories, that cannot be added automatically by the build system. Non ndk-build projects only.

StringListProperty.Name: AdditionalLibraryDirectories
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies one or more directories to search for library debug symbols.

StringProperty.Name: BuildXmlPath
StringProperty.Description: Path to the GDB working directory.

StringProperty.Name: GdbSetupPath
StringProperty.Description: Path to the gdb.setup file folder. If not specified, the default path will be used.

StringProperty.Name: JavaSourceDir
StringProperty.Description: Path to the Java source code root folder. Can be relative to $(ProjectDir) or absolute. If empty then it will use the path from the Ant Build page. If that page is disabled then 'src' relative to build.xml path.

StringProperty.Name: JavaClassesDir
StringProperty.Description: Path to the Java classes folder. Can be relative to $(ProjectDir) or absolute. If empty then 'bin\classes' relative to build.xml path.
